ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 48
ygData.msgSnippet: Can you be more specific ? :) I have heard of quest robes any idea where the quest begin ? And where are the npc you speak about ? What the ac of such robe ?
ygData.messageBody:
Can you be more specific ? :) I have heard of quest robes any idea where the
quest begin ? And where are the npc you speak about ? What the ac of such
robe ?

thanks!

yakos

level 15 wizzard


p.s. just a tips for people that doesn't know : just hit the numlock one
time to run without touching the arrows of the keyboard :) very cool to run
and speak :)




Date: Tue, 4 May 1999 09:02:54 -0700
From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
Subject: Re: More Robe Stuff

Go to Befallen and get some Demask robes... or if you can... hit that
Tharmateurgist (spelling?) and get his (Gossmer I think, maybe he just has
the brown robes though... either is better than guild robes.)

Couple more levels... group with a few higher levelers and hit Najere for
Flowing black... ;)

Drev
